description:
Elevate your outdoor run or hike ensemble with this wool-blend base layer. Crafted with a high-collar hood and thumbhole cuffs for enhanced warmth, its moisture-wicking capabilities and breathability ensure peak performance.

  • Stay on-trend and on-point with the high collar design
  • Anti-chafing stitching prevents friction during your activities
  • Thumbhole cuffs keep your sleeves securely in place
  • Conveniently store smaller items in the mini pocket
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Orbit Scuba Hood Long Sleeve - Women's
